text: Seyyed Ali Tabrizi () (born 1881 - died 1957), known as Seyyed Ali Damad of constitutionalists, was from Iran. Seyyed Ali Tabrizi, who because of the bridegroom Sheikh Muhammad Hassan Mamaghani is his Syed Ali Damad say.Gulshan- e-Abrar , Vol. 7, p. 219.Encyclopedia of Mohammad-Kazem Khorasani, Vol 8, p 323. ==Professors== (Sayyad Ali) in the second half of the 13th century was a way of Najaf. People like Sheikh Hadi Tehrani, Mirza Habibollah Rashti and Sheikh Muhammad Hassan Mamaghani appeared and reached the rank of ijtihad. Also Mohammad-KazeExcuse Vol 2, p 22. ==References== Category:People from Tabriz Category:People of the Persian Constitutional Revolution Category:Shia Muslim scholars Category:1881 births Category:1957 deaths
title: Syed Ali Damad
